type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.InputFile
type.description:
*

Marks a property as specifying an input file for a task.

* *

This annotation should be attached to the getter method or the field for the property.

* *

This will cause the task to be considered out-of-date when the file path or contents * have changed. To make the up-to-date check only dependent on the path and not the contents * of the file or directory, annotate it instead with {@link org.gradle.api.tasks.Input}.
